comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Built in the 1590s for Bess of Hardwick and famous for the rhyme "Hardwick Hall, More window than wall." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hardwick_Hall

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: It's soooo amazing to think (for those of us in America) that decades before the Pilgrims arrived, this incredible Hardwick Hall was already standing — and it's as beautiful today as it was then!

comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: it's very beautiful to this day and well worth a visit: www.nationaltrust.org.uk/hardwick/
